title: Home Sweet Home
description:
Your home is important. It’s where you keep all your belongings, it’s where you sleep, it’s where you feel the most safe - well, should feel the most safe. This week’s episode is about homes that have no heart. First, Sapphire takes you on a trip to the notorious House of Doon. Then, we’ll explore a supposedly cursed haunted house attraction in Nebraska. After that, we’ll stop by a dilapidated shack in New York. And finally, move into a house that’s next door to an abandoned church with a dark history.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
